attributes.action: Urgently cancel current and re negotiate terms /conditions of current extradition agreement with the Usa        ntwith the USA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a currently a massive imbalance in the rights and protection offered by local legislation to the citizens of the UK compared with those of the USA
We have handed over significant amounts of our our national sovereignty with no comparable reciprocal arrangements.
US domestic law does not apply to crimes committed in the UK.
